Package gameWorld

Class Floor

java.lang.Object
gameWorld.Floor
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Floor
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
A Floor is a list of Rooms all being accessible via one Door or more.

This class has two import variables, the first one being the list of Rooms, lRoom. And the second one is the actualPosition, also called curentRoom in GameWorld.

We also store the SpawnRoom's position as that's the place where the hero will first spawn in.

A Floor can either be constructed randomly by specifying the length, width and number of MobRooms wanted. Or by referring a list of Rooms.

See Also:
Door Room, Serialized Form
